title: NXT Energy Solutions Announces Second Quarter 2025 Results
description: CALGARY, AB / ACCESS Newswire / August 11, 2025 / NXT Energy Solutions Inc. ("NXT" or the "Company") (TSX:SFD)(OTCQB:NSFDF) today announced financial and operating results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. Dollar amounts are in Canadian Dollars, ...
summary: NXT Energy Solutions Inc. (TSX:SFD)(OTCQB:NSFDF) has announced its financial and operating results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company reported revenues of $14.1 million for the first half of the year, largely due to repeat contracts in high potential regions and a focus on geographical diversification. Despite a year-to-date net income of $0.70 million reduced by a non-cash charge of $7.74 million due to a fair value adjustment to convertible debentures following the 178% increase in NXT's share price during Q2-25. The Company also announced a second contract for 2025 with its Strategic Alliance Partner, Synergy E&P Limited, to provide another SFD® survey in Africa. Key financial and operational highlights included the data acquisition phase of the Southeast Asia SFD# Survey and Ataraxia Capital converting US$2,300,000 of convertible debents into 13,540,208 commons shares.
shortSummary: NXT Energy Solutions reported a 46% increase in second quarter profits to $0.08 per share, driven by continued geographical expansion and convertible debentures conversion.
argos_summary: NXT Energy Solutions Inc. reported financial results for Q2 2025, highlighting SFD® revenues of $14.1 million for the first half of the year, driven by repeat contracts and geographical diversification. The company experienced a net income of $0.70 million year-to-date, despite a non-cash charge of $7.74 million due to a fair value adjustment of convertible debentures. Additionally, NXT is progressing with SFD® surveys in Africa and Southeast Asia, aiming to enhance shareholder value through strategic contract bookings for 2026.
